settings.content:
Free socks for order over $99

Free necklace for order over $129

Free Bracelet for order over $199

Free Tee for order over $239

Apply for all product on site. Buy more gift bigger!

Note: The offer cannot be used together with other promotion offers.
We want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. Items can be returned or exchanged within 30 days of delivery.

settings.code:
<script>
    var ua = navigator.userAgent;
    var ipad = ua.match(/(iPad).*OS\s([\d_]+)/),
    isIphone = !ipad && ua.match(/(iPhone\sOS)\s([\d_]+)/),
    isAndroid = ua.match(/(Android)\s+([\d.]+)/),
    isMobile = isIphone || isAndroid;

    window.Cloud = {
      language: 'en',
      device: isMobile ? 'M':'pc',
      COUNTRY_CODE: $('.currency-option').val(),    
      sitename:'48917'
    }
</script>
<script src="//cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0610/7208/1122/t/24/assets/op-analytics.js?v=118671256134864980591657855836753"></script>      
<script type="text/javascript">   
    // (function(){
    //     let timer = setInterval(()=>{
    //         $('.cbb-also-bought-slider-list .cbb-also-bought-product').find('a').each(function(){
    //             let $a = $(this);
    //             let href = $a.attr('data-href');
    //             $a.removeAttr('data-href');
    //             $a.attr({'data-url': href,'target':'_blank'});
    //             clearInterval(timer);
    //         })
    //         $('.cbb-also-bought-slider-list .cbb-also-bought-product').find('a').on('click',function(){
    //             // setTimeout(()=>{window.open=$(this).attr('data-url')},100)
    //             window.open($(this).attr('data-url'))
    //         })         
    //     },500)
        
    // })()
    var OPDataReport = function(opts) {
        this.initializeVariables()
        typeof jQuery !== 'undefined' && typeof OPAnalytics !== 'undefined' && this.init()
    }
  
    OPDataReport.vars = {}
  
    OPDataReport.prototype = {
        constructor: OPDataReport,
        initializeVariables: function() {
            var vals = OPDataReport.vars
            for (var name in vals) {
                if (vals.hasOwnProperty(name)) {
                    this[name] = vals[name]
                }
            }
        },
        
        detailDataReport: function() {
            var menu = $('.product-single__title').text();          
            OPAnalytics.track({
                name: 'monstervalley:detail_youmayalsolike_exposure',
                url: window.location.href,
                sitename: Cloud ? Cloud.siteId : window.location.hostname,
                page: 'detail',
                menu: menu,
                bindedEl: 'window',
                targetEl: '.cbb-also-bought-slider-list .cbb-also-bought-product',
                action: 'EXPOSE',
                desc: '',
                hostname: ''
            })
            OPAnalytics.track({
                name: 'monstervalley:detail_youmayalsolike_click',
                url: window.location.href,
                sitename: Cloud ? Cloud.siteId : window.location.hostname,
                page: 'detail',
                menu: menu,
                bindedEl: 'document',
                targetEl: '.cbb-also-bought-slider-list .cbb-also-bought-product',
                action: 'CLICK',
                desc: '',
                hostname: ''
            })  
            OPAnalytics.track({
                name: 'monstervalley:detail_product_view',
                url: window.location.href,
                sitename: Cloud ? Cloud.siteId : window.location.hostname,
                page: 'detail',
                menu: menu,
                bindedEl: 'document',
                targetEl: '',
                action: 'VIEW',
                desc: $('#productSpu').val() || '',
                hostname: ''
            })
            $('.product-single__add-to-cart').length && OPAnalytics.track({
                name: 'monstervalley:detail_addtocart_click',
                url: window.location.href,
                sitename: Cloud ? Cloud.siteId : window.location.hostname,
                page: 'detail',
                menu: menu,
                bindedEl: 'document',
                targetEl: '.product-single__add-to-cart',
                action: 'CART',
                desc: 'add to cart',
                hostname: ''
            })
            if(Cloud.device === 'M') {
                OPAnalytics.track({
                    name: 'monstervalley:detail_scrolltop_click',
                    url: window.location.href,
                    sitename: Cloud ? Cloud.siteId : window.location.hostname,
                    page: 'detail',
                    menu: menu,
                    bindedEl: 'document',
                    targetEl: '.m-scroll-top',
                    action: 'CLICK',
                    desc: 'scroll to top',
                    hostname: ''
                })
            }
        },
  
        init: function() {
            var self = this;
            $(document).ready(function() {
              // 根据URL判断页面类型 执行对应的埋点
                
  
              // goods detail
              self.detailDataReport();
              window.currentPage = 'detail'
              
            })
        }
    }
    new OPDataReport();
  
    (function() {
        if(typeof Utils !== 'undefined') {
            var utmArr = ["utm_source", "utm_medium", "utm_campaign", "utm_term", "utm_adset", "utm_content", "browser_mode"];
            var i, utils;
            var queryObj = Utils.getGet()
            for (i=0; i< utmArr.length; i++) {
                var item = utmArr[i]
                if(typeof Utils === 'function') {
                    utils = new Utils();
                } else {
                    utils = Utils;
                }
                if(queryObj[item]) {
                    utils.setCookie(item, queryObj[item], 86400 * 7)
                }
            }
        }
    })();
  </script>
